text:
If it's not the swagster himself. Allah Hafiz Huzoor
Legend aadmi hai aap, chahe wo Dramatics related skills ho ya Volleyball related. Apna alag style hai tumhara jisko koi kitna bhi chahe match kar hi nahi sakta. Aap sir ki jitni bhi baate yaad hai sab bakchodi ki hi hai chahe devraj ho ya devraj ka role seedhe play se hi katna ho. Yaar pata hai it's kinda ironic but holi vacation ke ek raat pehle aapke saath hi Hall 2 cycle stand me sutts ke maze le rahe the, tumhe sutts camp me aate se kaafi bakchodi badh gayi hai.
Bro pata hai tumhe yaad kare to Dram Room ke baahar waale discussion s yaad aate hai jisme tum aur Varun proper discussion kar rahe hote the aur hum chutiya naa dikhne ki poori koshish karte the. Same case in Hall-2 Reading room and MT. Yaar sach bata rahe hum log bithoor trip ke pehle Hall 12 me baiht ke Welcome dekh rahe the aur soch rahe the ki nikale to kaun kaun maanega, usme ye tha ki Ostwal Rochak RR karenge lekin Aadesh ko uthaenge wo utha ke leage baaki sab ko bina kisi R.R. ke and that was exactly what Shukla ji did.
Tumse bas 1 shikayat hai ki tum Rafting pe saath nahi chale but again that trip was epic even without the rafting. Ab jaldi se sort ko Corona to milte hai bhi chalenge kahi mast ghoomne aapse aur gyaan lene aur obviously sutts ka aanand lene.
Love you bro
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text: Bhai itnee vilambh ke liye khed hai, aapse to naata sabse purana hai from AH sir to Hall 5.. Pata hai jab hall me just ghuse the aur baap assign ho rahe the (kinda odd thing to say) but you were the first familiar face. Uske baad bauhat kam baat hui lekin jab bhi mess me chahe class me mile humesha aesa hi laga ki abhi kal hi to mile the.. Still I was free because tumse pata nahi kyu thi ek understanding ki Judge to nahi hi karega ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£. Tumhara bio padhe to realise hua ki kitna opposite stay raha hai hum dono ka but still trust me tum jitna mast rehte to aur sincerely apna kaam bhi karte ho waise bauhat kam logo ko successfully karte dekhe hai hum. Thanks bro for everything and hope we cross paths again I have to debate on the relevance of Galaxy with you ðŸ™‚ðŸ™‚.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Look who it is, the Argumentative turned fucking Gypsie Allen Nair. Namaskaaram...
Yaar obviously teri pehli memory to foyer se bhaagne waali hi hai dimaag me lekin uske baad agle 2 saal itni aag lagae tum foyer me jiska koi compairison nahi hai. Chahe Mirza ho ya Sameer Fuddi, if someone has a unique way to make a line fun, it's Alan. 
Bro I remeber the first time you told me how you travelled for 2 full days in train to reach campus eating just what you could get at stations and trust me the level of respect I had for you after than cannot be defined in words.
Ab isko zyaada lamba nahi karte bas jaldi se Software ki duniya me aag laga do aur mast kamayi karte rahe aur please please hume mat bhoolne... I might need Multi Millionare CEO friends like you in the future.
Cheers Mate
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text: Bro vilambh ke liye khed hai, but sach batae to apne project ke baad ye to feel aa hi gaya hoga that I like staying close to deadline.... Jo bhi ho yaar thanks a lot, meri branch me bauhat logo se kabhi baat hui nahi uske baad 3rd year me aur final courses me thanks for being there... Swag kayam rakhna bro, I have irritated you a lot I know but I have always respected your work.. Cheers
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Hii choti ladki,
Tum mast ho seriously aur ye abhi se nahi first year se pata hai. We met in drameve1 aur uske baad to Literally humare beech me ek poora fest aana pada to keep you away..Tumhe pareshaan dekhe busy dekhe lekin aaj tak kabhi aesa nahi hua ki tumhe dekh ke haste haste taali maarne naa aae ho (We'll not about IT) .  Yaar shuru se hi shuru karte hai, Drameve-1 was lit Drameve 2 me I made one the feats that I am the most proud of till date.... being to supporting writter in the birth of Thaat se nikala Tharki Thakur..... And then Drameve 2 jaha although tum doosri side thi phir bhi ladayi hoti thi tere liye, hume khud yaad hia kayi baar Varun ko jaake bole the ki ladki sikhana hai yaar plz Anchal ko bhej do.
Phir thoda 2-3 mahina beech ka skip karte hue is one of the biggest regrets... us Bithoor waali trip ke liye tumhe call nahi kiye the but jo bhi hua is baat ki khushi hai ki you were with us when we were a full time resident at Mr. Ostwal's room. Sube se 6 baje kabhi exam ke liye nahi uthe honge lekin tum aur ramya theek 6 baje aa jaati thi aur phir sab kahi naa kahi jagah dhoond ke so jaate the. Un times ko yaad karke sach me bas yahi lagta hai ki bore ho jaate kahi phist year me choti ladki naa mili hoti to.
Yaar Gh canteen me ice-cream treat and that fucking Lion King 3D .... mast tha aur chahe kitni bhi dikkate aayi ho lekin ab yaad karo naa to samajh aata hai ki tum kuch na kuch karke humesha rahi ho saath. The IIT Roorkee trip and specially rafting...(boat bros) Wo pattar pe baith ke maggie sach me nahi bhooli jaegi. Last me 1 wing ka difference Hall-1 me zaroor tha lekin phir bhi humesha pata tha ki kahi bhi masti karne jae Anchal ko bulana hi hai, kyoki wo aa jaegi.
Thanks bro aur jab bhi koi bhi plan bane tumhari bina nahi ho raha to aa jaiyega yaad se. See you soon and miss you.
Deb.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Bro tera memoir likhe bina complete nahi ho sakta mera memoirs likhna, the most optimistic and hall waadi person I know. Bauhat logo ko galaxy ke time feel aate dekhe lekin is maamle me tumhe koi beat nahi kar sakta. 
Yaar pata hai bro first year se hi tumhara mazaak udate hai bauhat lade hai tumse but still Anant was always the excited and reliable one jisko chahe MSE ka kaam ho jae hall ka contact kar sakte the. Baaki club ki BT bhad me jae lekin all 3 of the galaxies we were a part of would be incomplete without you. Aur apan dram trophy bhale hi nahi laa pae but Apna bana ke nukkad jeete (that nukkad was probably the best) aur jaate jaate Play aur Galaxy bhi Hall 5 ke naam apna milke kar hi liye. Bhai ab zyaada emotional hue bina just thanks for everything chahe wo first year me Drameve 1 play me saath ho ya Final year me Placement ki BT sab me saath rehne ke liye. Ofcourse you are one of the few jinse hume koi doubt nahi hai ki touch me rahenge hi, chahe kitna bhi gariya le lekin Anant Jain se kuch na kuch kaam pad hi jaata hai.
Mast rehna aesehi bro, jaldi milte hai..
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Badi duvidha hai Katiyar sahab zaraa sahayta karne ka kasht kare, hua ye hai ki aapka memior likhna hai lekin humare dimaag me bas non-stop loop me aapka "hihi hihi has dele Rinkiya ke papa waala dance hi chal raha hai".... You were a surprise, jis samay humare group me ek tarfa Aasman Gir Raha hai waalo ka raaj tha us samay pata nahi kaha se tum aa gaye aur at first koi mind nahi kiya lekin with time tumhare bina sab incomplete lagne laga. 

Okay let me start over, Yo Katiyar,
First memory jaisa to kuch hai nai bas ye tha ki Drameve2 me koi hai Katiyar naam ka jiske around kahaniya sunayi padti thi... text seperately for details,,,,, and second year ki Drameve-1 me Katiyar tha one of my best friends. Yaar KT ki kahaniya bahaut hai but I remeber the rebel, jo club ke kisi rule ko maanne me interested nahi tha aur jisko kisi bhi baat ke liye manane me alag se Chitral ko prakat hona padta tha. Obviously kabhi nahi bhool sakte koi bhi trip chahe RDV ya InterIIT-R ya even Chitkara.
Hume yaad hai jab antaragni jeete the us raat ko after a very chutiya treat (because of someone), hum log nikale the and i say Rishabh katiyar with the bottle, akele poora khatam karke bhi bilkulll sober aur hume bolta hua ki yaar Varun ka abhi mat batana. That was lit kyoki tumhe aaj tak 2 hi tarah se dekhe hai hume ya to bilkul sober.. even after drinking al bottle alone or border-line dead. Wo raat ko kabhi nahi bhoola paenge bauhat normal si panchayat Nipun ke room aur achanak se katiyar baithe baithe girne laga, uske baad jo hua was the most intense struggle of keeping you out of that puddle everrr, ending in Ramya saying ki isko pade rehne do usi me abhi pehle baaki saaf kar lo tab isko uthaenge.....
Yaad tum jis shiddat se logo ki maarte the senior junior alike wo kabhi nahi bhoolenge. Tumhari aur Anant jain ki equation, galaxy nukkad 2020 and Katiyar ko coordinator banane ke liye Chitral ka shadiyantra are actually epicc. Obviously in sab me wo Galaxy 2019 ka kaala samay bhi tha aur wo bhi tha jab Ostwal tak pauhachne ka sirf ek hi raasta hota tha Katiyar.
Wo mime madhu sa sube 5 baje waali practice aur uske like sabb ka Ostwal ke room me sona are the most fun memories, aur in sab me apna bond bhi bakchod tha,... hume Mime Madhu ki workshop ka bas itna yaad hai (flight ko chod ke) ki tumhare upar se koodne me haath pe chot lagwae the lekin uske baad kuch bolne ki jagah hum dono 15 min tak haste rahe the bas.
Is baat ka humesha dukh to rahega hi ki theek se bye bye nahi bol pae hum lekin tum to Kanpur waale hi ho, in general aap se to milne aate hi rahenge. 
Also aap ke level ka likh to nahi hi sakte phir bhi ye memior chahe kaisa bhi ho, bro thanks a lot mazaa nahi aata yaar tum nahi hote is journey me to. Our friendship was forged in Dramatics and ESC aur ESC ka eklauta D hai mera which I don't really mind that much.
Chaapte Rehna bro, aapko attention milti rahegi aesehi..... Fuck Nana :)
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Bhaiya sabse pehle to apna Bio change kar, probably kya hota hai Girish Sharma is definetely the chillest person on campus. You are a legend aur aapke jaise logo se hi milne ki waje se kabhi regret nahi hua drams ka, khushi khushi kehte hai ki Fursat Mandli Fakr hai because I got to make friends with awesome people like you. Tumhare saath event by event yaad karne ki zaroorat nahi hai kyoki Girish Sharma ke saath jab bhi time  spend kiye hai, even in lecture bakchodi hi hui hai. Tumhare interIIT naa aane ka dukh to bauhat tha lekin Girish Bhaiya ka RDV train waala kaarnama kabhi nahi bhulenge jab Nipun ko ye bol ke taash nahi khareedne diye the ki mere paas hai........ Itna ganda to Nipun ka aaj tak Chitral bhi nahi kaate.
All jokes aside, we lost touch in the last few sems but tumhe bhi wahi kahenge jo Barwal ko kahe, tum logo ki growth dekh ke humesha proud hi feel hota hai of being friends with legends like you. Aur haa in sab me summer play to miss nahi hi kar sakte, jab tumhari birthday waale poore din marwane ke baad Hall 2 court me cake kaate the. I was incharge ki Girish ground me aae waha se court tak usko pata naa chale iska dhyaan rakhna, but tbh I had no clue ki chupa kya rahe hai, tumhara cake dekh ke I was equally surprised...
Still Bhai ab sabb marwadi dost bana liye hume to Rajasthan to aana hi padega bas aap apni kripa aesehi banae rakiyega to jaldi se milte hai aapke Rajasthan se uthate hai aur kahi ghoomne chalte hai.
Chapte Raho..
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Jetti Ramya,, I have a confession to make apan 7-8 dosto me bas ek tum thi jisse hume darr lagta tha kyoki baaki sab se to hum just kidding bol ke bach jaate the lekin getting on the wrong side of Jetti was fatal as fuck.
Tumse pata nahi kab itna open ho gaye, bauhat bhari interovert Ramya Jetti Drams club me complete surprise thi, hum sab Drameve-1 waalo ke beech me aake phir tik hi gayi. Tumse dosti hui to ek bauhat kattar dushmani ke baad aur uske baad to chahe wo summer play me literally poora din sabka ostwal ke room me rehna ho ya Katiyar ki BT utana Jetti ke bina kuch nahi hota tha. 
(I have voluntarily decided to avoid talking about "THAT" topic) But still thank you for standing up for us when we needed the most.
Tum bhi end me sutts partner ho hi gayi to jaldi hi milte hai With a bottle of Vo**a in hand.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Loki bhai............. Tu God hai bro Tu GOD hai.
Aaj tak wo aadmi hume Banarasi Babu bulata aaya hai, wo insaan jiske performance se ache se intimidate ho jae Us Interpector Vajpayee to mere Har Har Mahadev.
Bhai pata hai abhi Ostwal aur Rochak ke bhi memoirs likhe hum lekin un dono me aur tere saath meri bonding me ek bauhat major difference hai. Ostwal ke room me bakchodi hoti thi jab Drams ke kaam se khali hoke aate the sab, lekin tumhare saath tab tab bonding hoti thi jab ye sab drams ke cordinator ka bhar sambhalte the aur hum aapke saath baith ke B-bot me dhoop sekte the. 
Chahe Shakuni mama ho ya Sunil Shetty Loki ki performance ke baad kisi ki himmat nahi hoti thi ki usko follow kare.... (Nipun try kiya ... yaad hai naa kya hua tha uske saath). Aur un sab ke baad bhi tere jitna down to Earth aadmi nai dekha yaar. Tumhare life me jo ch*d hue the unke baare me tum thoda bauhat batae the lekin un sab ko overcome karke tum kaise aage badh gaye wo bhi dekhe hai hum.
Yaar bhai baaki sab se to ye keh rahe hai ki milenge phir kabhi naa kabhi lekin tumse ek waada chahiye hume... bhai tere saath Amarnath jaana hai jab tum bolo jaha bhi honge sab chod ke chalenge lekin chalenge zaroor.
Actually a fan!
Banarasi Babu
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Haa bhai netaji Namaskaar,
So like all great things in life, aapka memoir bhi bilkul last date pe likh rahe hai. Subah subah ka samay hia uthte se realise hua ki OH FUCKK aaj 10 hai BC. Yaar ek baat to hai ki kaafi BT laata hai ye memoir 2 baar likhne ki koshish kiye lekin... too much emotions. To ab bina kisi vilambh ke shuru karte hai. 

Haa bhai netaji Namaskaar again!
Nipun Goyal ko yaad karo to ek to yaad aati hai tumhari hasi aur doosri Katiyar level ki BT (maybe even higher.) Jab naye naye club me aae the tab Nipun Goyal was someone jo saala har role le jaata tha, kitna bhi koshish kar lo lekin tum dram eve 1 me circle me aaye nahi ki role kata.... one of the overachieversss but it's kinda fitting that, the overachiever actually went on to become one of the best performers club has ever seen. Tumhe pata nahi hoga lekin ye joke more or less dram-eve-1 se hi chal raha hia ki Nipun se role lene ka ek hi tareeka hai ki usko practice karne do, lodu apna gala khud kharaab kar lega.........
Ye to hui club aur performance ki baat but aapse dosti ka level alag hai. Jo 3 saal campus me rahe usme almost aadha time to Hall-12 me rahe honge, kyoki galaxy chod do to baaki time I was less Hall 5 more Hall 12 + Hall 5. Koi bhi kaam hai kitna bhi chod hua ho sabse pehla phone Nipun ko hi lagta tha, and I really hope ye kabhi naa badle. 
Kya kya chutiyape nahi kiye honge saath me..... Sahi batae to first year ka to aur yaad nahi hai lekin second year Drameve-1 me bhi apan saath hi the aur tu bhi mana nahi kar paega that it was fucking funnnn. The bad cop Nipun ke foyer me aate se hum aur Ostwal nikal lete the kyoki Rochak aur Nipun jab serious hoke gariyana chalu karte the to humari hasi nikal jaati thi. Ostwal aaj tak R.R. karta hai ki usko gane sikhane baitha diye the lekin sab kharaab casting teri thi as bad cop. (Baaking play casting  pe baad me aaenge ;)
Tumhare saath ki memories shayad baaki sab se alag hai kyoki club ka koi bhi kaam ho jisme campus ke bahar jaana hota tha to tumhe yaad kiya jaata tha aur tumhara call mere paas aata tha ki bache jugaad aur tu bhi aaja aadhe ghante me nikalenge...... Bahar ki almost har memory me tum ho chahe wo instruments theek karana ho, kurte khareedna, ya wo famous Dosa khana......
Tumhare sexual orientation pe koi pun nahi maarenge because I see ki almost har memoir me mention kiye hi hai log.... bas itni advice hai ki agli baar Chitral ko to apne prem kahaniya mat hi sunana. Baaki I hope tumhe wo Hall-12 terrace ka vartalaap yaad hoga between you me and Varun when you were superbly screwed over..... yaad naa ho to whatsapp me mil yaha details nahi denge.
Yaar trips kya yo batae IIT Delhi was lit and IIT Roorkee was something else. Mera aur rochak ka room just next to You and Varun, us trip ke baare me to soch ke dukh isiliye hota hai because that was toooo fun. Aur mere shaul waala look to sab yaad dilae lekin tumahara ek kaarnaama us trip ka hume yaad hai jo kabhi nahi bhool sakte, The Time NIPUN GOYAL Let Go.. 31st December 1-2 degree ke paani me nahane utare sab chain pakad ke aur tum dubki maare anddddd You just let go, tumhare sabse bagal me hum hi the and I remeber the moment jab ye realise hua ki ya to hum peeche jaa rahe hai ya tum beh rahe ho...... And btw I remeber the ONE joke that HE had..
Yaar kis kis baat ke liye Thank you bole tumhe samajh hi nahi aate, tere room me parties ke liye, Hall-12 mess ki unofficial membership ke liye ya Squad chodne ke liye.... all equally good things..
Ab aur kya bole baate nahi khatam ho rahi ye to pakaa hai lekin ye bhi pakka hai ki yaade banna bhi band to nahi hi hongi, ye to sabko bol chuke hai ki agr alge saal Antaragni hui to Nipun ke room pe aake reh rahe hai 4 din hum. Baaki BT ka bas mentaion kar dete hai I am sure tumhe apne aap baate yaad aa jaengi.... Baldev Singh, Acting GenSec, RDV Late night phone incident aur IIT Bombay. Yaad naa aae to call kar lena kisi bhi time..
In the end yahi kahenge ki bhalehi kitne bhi ameer ho lekin college life khatam hui tab bhi aapse udhari thi, tumhare 15000 ki Canteen bill me atleast 2-3K ka yogdaan to mera tha aur bro on a very serious note, tumse milne ke baad ab life me bas ameer hona nahi Nipun Goyal ki tarah dildaar banna hai. 
Trip to ho rahi hai nahi karenge naatak, bas saaman rakh lena tum aur haa apna baati chokha ka plan bhi bacha hai bhulna mat.. Bas karte hai memoir hai Summer Play nahi ki chalta hi jaa raha hai..
All the best netaji, you are a legend.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Haa bhai! Ostwal baaki sab to theek hai pehle ye bata.... sutts hai? Yaarrrr kya likhe teri tareef me... Yaar sach batae to kabhi soche nahi the ki TOA2 me AH Sir ki gaaliyan share karne ke baad ek din tere saath sutts share karenge aur in that process I will find one of my best friends in you.
Pata hai bro, tere determination aur kaam karne ke tareeke se day-1 se jalte the hum kyoki kitna bhi koshish kar lo wo Ostwal level ki zidd kabhi aayi hi nahi. Koi aadami summer me din bhar play me marwane ke baad bhi InterviewBit kholne ki himmat rakhe to wo bas Ostwal hi ho sakta hai.
Yaar tujhe yaad karo to wo InterIIT ki trip yaad aati hai. December ka mahina 5 degree temprature aur thanda paani. Usme Ostwal aur Rochak ka wo plan yaad aata hai ki nahate hai bc dekha jaega aur phir...... 5 min baad apne adjacent cubical se teri chillane ki aawaze yaad aati hai. Yaar tareef karna kabhi nahi aaya hume aur usko as sarcasm chupate aae hai but to be honest Nilay ke jaane ke baad tum hi wo 1 aadmi tha jisko hum personal baate bata sakte the without the risk of any leaks, chahe wo mere breakup ki baat ho ya Academic Warning ki, it was just you who I could trust it with.
Bhai itna kuch saath me dekhe hai hum log ki sirf Katiyar hi hai wo usko words me samjha sakta hai aur uske liye bhi usko ek poora gaana likhna hoga.
Aage ke liye kya hi bole, tu waise bhi kabhi room pe nahi bulata tha to abhi bhi bas khud sahi se rahiye hum tujhe aur sutts ko dhoondte party karne pauhach hi jaenge. 
Thanks Bhai
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Yaar wo Antaragni ke din probably sabse bakchod memories hai campus ke aur use tumhe mention nahi karte to complete nahi ho sakta . Partners in crime we bonded on just 2 word "Chod Hua" bas. Chahe kuch bhi ho jae palak ka phone aata tha to pata hota tha she'll start with judge maa ch*da rahe hai, Bache maa ch*da rahe hai ya Ratnesh maa ch*da raha hai....
Wo Anjan Srivastava ka "Us ladki do samjha dijiye" tha ya Ratnesh ka "Mai meditate karne jaa raha" tum hi thi jo shant reh leti thi, and still you were the one jiske saamne bachhon ki bakchodi karne ki himmat nahi hoti thi. Kaafi zyaada chapu time spend kiye hai tumhare saath chahe wo Hall-1 ho, events ground ya L-7. 
Bakchodi kayam rakhna, Umeed hai phir milenge.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
First of all, teri DP me ... that's my jacket. Nana bhai tere baare me kya hi bole, Orientation yaad hai hume jab tum pehli baar "Nana" kiye the and uske baad seedhe Antaragni17 jab nukkad ke beech me sab 3-4 year ke beech me ek first year aake chaap ke chala gaya tha. Tumse zyaada shayad hi kisi ki maare ho kabhi, lekin bhai tumhe miss bauhat karenge yaar. Tu 3rd year me Nipun ke room me kam hi aata tha, volleyball me gayab rehta tha lekin uske baad bhi kitna bhi gariya le Nana ke aana se party ka mazaa badh jaata tha. 
Now I 100% agree ki humare group me most probably I was the one wo sabse zyaada maara hai tumhari, chahe wo IIT Roorkee me sube sube tumhare gayab hone pe tumhari maarna ho ya uske bas 1 hi din baad zabaradasti tumse poore Y17 ko treat dilwana lekin yaar in sab me sorry nahi bol rahe hum kyoki tu tha yaar, nana mast aadmi hai isiliye to ye sab ar lete the nana ke saath isiliye to aaj se 2 saal pehle tere saath photo khichwae the ye soch ke ki ye to As we leave ka portrait hoga.
Tum un logo me ho jo abhi kuch din aur campus ki shobha badhenge to tum to chinta mat karo aate rahenge kam se kam 1 saal aur aapke maze lene aur aapke saath legend level ka Volleyball khelne.
Maze me rehna bro nana ki bakchodi kabhi kam nahi honi chahiye.
.......

Ohh fuckk, I almost forgot to talk about that nighttt........ uske bina ye memoir complete hi nahi ho sakta.... Yaar me Has Kyu raha ho. Wo raat jab Piyush Sunil Samartha ko Alan aur Rochak first time me poora joint phhokwa diye the aur Nana meri bas ek line "Suffering from Success" pe pehle 1 ghanta hasa aur phir 1 ghanta roya tha.... Bhai aaj tak kisi ko pata nahi us din tere dimaag me kya chal raha the. Aur bhai agli baar aae to yaad rakhna phir se wo OAT waali photo khichwaenge.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Argal Sahab Namaskaar, Tumhara bio padhe to raha nahi gaya, wo last line Antaragni management team me g**d ghiswane me hum bhi aapke saath the. Tum chapu aadmi ho yaar, I know bauhat garyae hai tumhe bauhat lade hai lekin un sab me pata tha ki kitna bhi gariya lo Ratnedha Argal apne kaam aadha nahi chodega. 
Hum yaad hai Antaragni ke 1 din pehle tumse kahe the ki bhai ho sakta hai fest ke time tumpe ukhad jae hum please personally mat lena aur tumhara reply tha wo sab ki chinta mat kar lekin uske baad sach me uski chinta nahi karni padi, kitna bhi kuch bhi hua ho but we managed it and we did it nicely.
Thanks yaar for everything you are one of the most patient people I know. Jaldi milte hai dost
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
oyy yaarr... chalo naa.... Bas yahi aata hai Rochak Dindor ke baare me socho to yahi sabse pehle yaad aata hai. Hands down the most fun person I knew in campus. Kitna bhi kharaab mood ho kitni bhi serious baat ho Rochak Dindor can take any topic and make it about chal maal maarte hai bc.
Although Aasman Gir Raha Hai me saath me the lekin I got to know the real Dindor during the brief practice of NSS nukkad. Kaala chasma lagae full swag me TS karta hua, itna ziddi ki nukkad khatam hone ke baad bhi apna 4-liner bol ke hi gaya.
Iske baad tumse dosti hui Summer me, Jab Aayush Ostwal was the Prop manager aur hum dono unke atyacharo se pareshaan hoke usko gariyate the aur in the end lad ke hi sahi kaam kar lete the. Also how can I forget Rochak DIndor the bad cop..... The most fun guy turned into a bad cop kyoki usi me to asli fun hai. Kedia se inspire hoke wo bachho ki maari thi ki hum dono bilkul opposite reasons se drameve-1 me bachon ke beech popular ho gaye the. 
Abhi thodi der pehle KT ke memoir me tune likha tha ki Varun ka Sarcasm Aishwarya se kam hai.... honoured but I have a similar comparison to make...... Nana kitni bhi koshish karle Rochak ki bakchodi kabhi match nahi kar paega. 
Saale tum msgs ke end me alvida to likh rahe ho lekin jaan lo ki tum officer ban jao chahe Pradhan Matri sutta lene tumhe hi phone karenge hum. Aur naa tumhe bhoolne denge kyoki jo scenes specially 2nd year Antaragni me apan milke banae the uske baad we are crime mates forever.
Bhai bauhat kuch hai tere baare me kehne ko to lekin ....... ab man nahi hai! Aapki shayari aur Ostwal ke liye innovative innovative gaaliyan sunne ka bada man karta hai..
Badalna mat be aur maa mat chudana kabhi milne ko bole to.. 
Baaki to Dindori baba zindabad hai the aur rahenge. Har Har Mahadev
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
oyy yaarr... chalo naa.... Bas yahi aata hai Rochak Dindor ke baare me socho to yahi sabse pehle yaad aata hai. Hands down the most fun person I knew in campus. Kitna bhi kharaab mood ho kitni bhi serious baat ho Rochak Dindor can take any topic and make it about chal m**l maarte hai bc.
Although Aasman Gir Raha Hai me saath me the lekin I got to know the real Dindor during the brief practice of NSS nukkad. Kaala chasma lagae full swag me TS karta hua, itna ziddi ki nukkad khatam hone ke baad bhi apna 4-liner bol ke hi gaya.
Iske baad tumse dosti hui Summer me, Jab Aayush Ostwal was the Prop manager aur hum dono unke atyacharo se pareshaan hoke usko gariyate the aur in the end lad ke hi sahi kaam kar lete the. Also how can I forget Rochak DIndor the bad cop..... The most fun guy turned into a bad cop kyoki usi me to asli fun hai. Kedia se inspire hoke wo bachho ki maari thi ki hum dono bilkul opposite reasons se drameve-1 me bachon ke beech popular ho gaye the.
Abhi thodi der pehle KT ke memoir me tune likha tha ki Varun ka Sarcasm Aishwarya se kam hai.... honoured but I have a similar comparison to make...... Nana kitni bhi koshish karle Rochak ki bakchodi kabhi match nahi kar paega.
Saale tum msgs ke end me alvida to likh rahe ho lekin jaan lo ki tum officer ban jao chahe Pradhan Matri sutta lene tumhe hi phone karenge hum. Aur naa tumhe bhoolne denge kyoki jo scenes specially 2nd year Antaragni me apan milke banae the uske baad we are crime mates forever.
Bhai bauhat kuch hai tere baare me kehne ko to lekin ....... ab man nahi hai! Aapki shayari aur Ostwal ke liye innovative innovative gaaliyan sunne ka bada man karta hai..
Badalna mat be aur maa mat ch**ana kabhi milne ko bole to..
Baaki to Dindori baba zindabad hai the aur rahenge. Har Har Mahadev
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Bhai sahab Namaskaar,
Itne vilambh ke liye khed hai but aesa to ho nahi sakta tha ki tumhe miss kar de. Bro apni start bakchod thi specially with our fucking amazing Drameve2 play. Aaj bhi us play ke baare me soche to tumhara starting dialogue yaad aata hai "Wo aapke Cabin me aese ghus aaya jaise wo uske jaangir ho".
Seriously bro 1st year summer won't have been the same without you, wo PHY103R with you, me and Benny was a much needed fraud from the streching of the two dancing chodus. But uske baad Drameve-1 me tera actual nukkad performance dekhne mila aur wo nukkad me koi chaapa tha to wo tum hi the. Yaar sab kuch hi epic tha and cherry on top was interIIT with You me and Varun.... kitna bhi sudhar jao kitne bhi bade babu ban jao lekin IIT Roorkee ki messes ko mat bhoolna kabhi.
Tum 2nd year summer me bhi is gareeb ka saath hi de rahe the lekin then we kinda fell out, us samay ajeeb lagta tha lekin sach batae to teri growth ( a.k.a. grades) dekh le lagta hai ki acha hi tha, kalko hume koi tender pass karana hoga ya koi sarkaari kaam hua to apne pehchan ke ek do afsar log rahenge to acha hi rahega. Bakchodi karte rehna bro aur bauhat jaldi most probably Jaipur ka hi plan banega to bas koi Randi Rone mat karna waha se jaha jaana hoga chala jaega. 
Love you bro
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Itni deri ke liye maafi but thodi aadat hai deadline pe jaagne ki in anycase yaar Suppu..... bhai tere se sweet aadmi ho nahi sakta and I am honest when I say that you were too good for us. Bilkul seedha saadha kam bolne waala suppu ek to Ostwal Rochak jaise logo ki wing me phas gaya tha aur phir Fursat Mandali.... Yaar actually thank you, tumhare saath memories are all of smilling aur excited bengali jisse kabhi OAT me treat le rahe hai ya Roorkee me bakchodi kar rahe.
Lekin chahe kuch bhi ho, InterIIT ya Chitkara tum humesha saath tha. Nukkad me research karna ho ya tumhara actually research portfolio ho, it was beyond what we guys could ever do.
Bro jaise ho waisehi rehna jaldi milte hai aur haa I remember you told me ki tum jin bengaliyon ki baat kar rahe ho wo mujhe bhi pasand nahi..... that comment was legenary. Chaapte rehna bro you were a literally gem in our group.
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal

text:
Varun Jain ....... Yaar pata hai Drameve-1 me to utni nahi hui thi tumse bonding but NSS nukkad me jo Varun Jain ki image thi mere man me wo thi, an not very hard to convince guy who is barely comfortable in the circle but boyyyyyy was I wrong. Us NSS nukkad ke baad 3 saal almost continously tumhare saath the and I saw the most strong willed person I know, Y17 to chodo Y16 waale bhi 2 log aate the baaki sab to batana aur baaki 2 jaate the Varun Jain ko manane. Also, you were the most comfortable person I ever saw in the circle. Hume yaad hai hum, tum aur Nipun gaye the dram treat ke liye paise lene aur koi bola tha tumse ki tum same tatti itni confidently kar kaise lete ho......
Itne performances kiye apan saath me chahe wo tumhara legendary role as Jamal (ya fazlu) ho ya the super legendary performance as Assistant Director Hamlet ho but apni bonding kaha hui ye shayad hume, tumhe aur Barwal ko hi pata hoga. IIT Roorkee ke wo mess ke chakkar yaar, those were the best times ever.
Yaar itnii memories hai ki kya kya batae, tera wo anokha negotiation at Dram Treat ya handling both Y18 and Y16 with the same attitude. I seriously I'll ever come across some one as relaxed as you. And ofcourse, this memoir would be incomplete without talking about the longest running credential in both of ours life.... Sexist Hall 12 + Aishwarya. Yaar aaj us baat ko 2 saal se zyaada ho gaye lekin abhi tak nahi samajh aaya tu kiya kya tha..... Mera to hume yaad hai that I was the one jo pehli chingaari diye the but tera aaj tak nahi pata. But still anyone who still doesn't know Varun Jain wo bas isse usko judge kar le ki Seniors nahi, Legacy nahi, Galaxy nahi the only reason why one of the Teams (None in particular) gave there all was to say at the end ki Varun Jain MC hai... 
You are a legend bro, chaapte raho aur teri ek hi baat thi ho placement ke us time me hume rukne ki nahi ..... ki tu ek company ke 2 tests nikala hai mere to mila ke 2 nahi nikale hai ....
All the best bhai aur jaldi milte hai Nipun ke room pe.... To the most excited sober at a party of Drunks.... Chaapte raho.

Y17 Fakr Hai,
A fellow Sexist
author: Aishwarya  Agrawal
